disclosures.details: I may have some interest in cattle operations in the gulf. Also I have close friends and relatives that will benefit directly and indirectly with the creation and opening up of the beef highway into Indonesia and China. And in mining nothing definite at this stage but I intend to take up old mining tenements discovered by myself prior to going into Parliament and involve myself in other mining activities but there are no specifics at this stage.

disclosures.entity: ANZ, Commonwealth, NAB, Metway and others

disclosures.details: The usual saving and cheque accounts
Part ownership of a rental property in Charters Towers
Refer to page 2,2 (1) "Family and business trust and nominee companies". I may from time to time get royalties from book sales.
Use of a private aircraft from time to time, sometimes during election campaigns - probably not happening these days.
I have in-laws that have extensive dealings with Government.
Some members of my family have interests in cattle
Painting - “The Road to Lawn Hill” Value $600. Gifted by Winsome Board, Ravenshoe Artist

I am negotiating to take up some of my ore (mining) reserves. Some of these reserves I was working before I went into Parliament. I'm looking to partner up with some local and possibly non-local partners. These people will vary from time to time.
